myHistoryContent: I have been interested in programming since the age of 12. It has become my passion and work. This is a creative activity and that's how I approach it. The multitude of approaches and solutions can fascinate.
whatDoContent: Currently, I work as a Software Developer creating various solutions. Moreover, in my free time, I try to develop open source projects - both my own and those of other creators.
